welcome.title: Create Your Space
welcome.description: Get started by creating your first workspace to organize your content and collaborate with others.

upload.failed: Failed to upload file, please try again later

resource.name: Resource
resource.no_content: Resource has no content to download

request.failed: Request Failed, Please Try Again Later

actions.copy_link_success: Your link has been copied successfully
actions.add_all_to_context: Add all Files to Chat Box
actions.add_it_to_context: Add this File to Chat Box
actions.add_it_only_to_context: Add this File only to Chat Box

form.username_min: Username must be at least 2 characters
form.username_max: Username must be at most 32 characters
form.username_no_emoji: Special characters are not allowed in username
form.password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters
form.password_reg: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain uppercase, lowercase letters, and numbers
form.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
form.email_or_username_invalid: Please enter a valid email address or username

invite.title: Add members via invite link
invite.description: Only members with invite permissions can view.
invite.join: {{ user }} invites you to join {{ namespace }}
invite.please_login_first: Please log in first to accept this invitation
invite.user_mismatch_generic: This invitation is for another user

namespace.name: Namespace Name
namespace.conflict: There's already a namespace with the same name
namespace.no_special_chars: Special characters are not allowed in namespace name

leave.title: Leave Space
leave.description: Leave this workspace. Your private data will be deleted.
leave.confirm_description: Are you sure you want to leave? Your private data will be permanently deleted.

delete.title: Delete Space
delete.description: Permanently delete this workspace and all its data.
delete.confirm_description: All data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
delete.warning_body: All data in this workspace will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.

login.email_not_exists: This email doesn't exist. Please sign up to continue.
login.phone_not_exists: This phone number doesn't exist. Please sign up to continue.
login.title: Login to your account
login.description: Enter your email below to login your account
login.wechat_disabled: WeChat login is not supported in the current environment
login.agree_our_rule: By clicking continue, you agree to our

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Enter your information to create an account
register.success: Registration successful, please check your email to activate your account
register.email_already_exists: This email is already registered. Please login to continue.
register.phone_already_exists: This phone number is already registered. Please login to continue.
register.conform_description: Enter your information to complete account creation

verify_otp.title: Enter verification code
verify_otp.error_too_many_attempts: Too many failed attempts. Please request a new code.
verify_otp.error_too_many_otp_requests: Too many OTP requests. Please try again in {{minutes}} minutes.

accept_invite.accepting_description: Creating your account and joining the space
accept_invite.error_accept: Failed to accept invitation. The link may be expired or invalid.

password.title: Reset Password
password.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
password.done: Password reset link has been sent to your email
password.conform_description: Enter your information to complete reset password

email.description: Please enter the verification code sent to your email
email.send_success: Verification code sent successfully, please check your email
email.will_send_verification: Please enter your new email address, we will send you a verification code
email.sent_code_to_account: We just sent a verification code to your account

phone.phone_invalid: Please enter a valid phone number
phone.will_send_verification: Please enter your phone number, we will send you a verification code

third_party_account.title: Third-party Account Management
third_party_account.description: Manage your third-party account bindings for quick login
third_party_account.unbind_confirm: Are you sure you want to unbind this account?
third_party_account.confirm_unbind_description: Are you sure you want to unbind your {{ type }} account? After unbinding, you will not be able to log in with this account.

delete_account.section_description: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data
delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.warning_body: Your account will be deleted. All your data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. You will receive a confirmation email.
delete_account.email_sent: Confirmation email sent. Please check your inbox.
delete_account.owner_with_members_error: Cannot delete account. You own one or more namespaces with other members. Please transfer ownership or remove members first.
delete_account.token_expired: Confirmation link has expired. Please try again.
delete_account.deletion_failed: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
delete_account.processing_description: Please wait while we process your request.
delete_account.success_description: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. You will be redirected to the login page.

applications.title: Application Management
applications.description: Manage your application integrations and bindings

already_bound.title: Already Connected
already_bound.description: You are already connected to the WeChat bot. You can scan the QR code below to add the bot to WeChat.

bind.title: Bind Application
bind.description: Follow these steps to connect your application
bind.step2: Step 2: Send Code to WeChat Bot
bind.code_instruction: Send this code to the WeChat bot to complete the binding

confirm.title: Cancel Binding
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to cancel the binding process for {{ name }}?

confirm.title: Unbind Application
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to unbind {{ name }}? This will disconnect the application from your workspace.

manage.owner_desc: Can change workspace settings and invite new members to the workspace.
manage.admin_desc: Can manage members and change workspace settings, but cannot transfer ownership or delete the workspace.
manage.member_desc: Cannot change workspace settings or invite new members to the workspace.
manage.sure_to_remove: Are you sure you want to delete the member?
manage.remove_title: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
manage.remove_desc: All private pages in this group will be transferred to you.
manage.remove_member: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
manage.keep_one_owner: Please keep at least one owner
manage.transfer_ownership_desc: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership to {{username}}? You will become an Admin and lose owner privileges.
manage.auto_tag_description: Automatically extract and generate tags from content using AI

unauth_page.title: Access Denied
unauth_page.desc: You do not have permission to access this page
unauth_page.alert_desc: Your current user permissions are insufficient to access this page or resource. To gain access, please contact the administrator to request the necessary permissions.
unauth_page.reason1: Your account does not have access to this resource
unauth_page.reason3: You may need a specific role or permission level

permission.full_access_desc: Edit, suggest, comment, and share with others
permission.demote: Are you sure you want to demote your own access?
permission.remove_self: Are you sure you want to remove your own access?
permission.grant_permission: Before removing this permission, please grant 'Full Access' to someone else.

greeting.morning: Good morning, how can I help you today?
greeting.afternoon: Good afternoon, how can I help you today?
greeting.evening: Good evening, how can I help you today?
greeting.night: Good night, how can I help you today?

upload.title: Import Resources
upload.subtitle: Let knowledge work for you
upload.description: Supports docs, webpage, audio, video and more
upload.local_tooltip: Try dragging local files to the sidebar
upload.wechat_tooltip: Chat with OmniBox AI in WeChat
upload.browser_tooltip: Save any webpage with one click

api_key.description: API keys allow you to programmatically access your resources.
api_key.empty: No API keys found. Create your first API key to get started.

create.title: Create API Key
create.description: Create a new API key to access your resources programmatically.
create.validation_error: Please fill in all required fields

confirm.title: Delete API Key
confirm.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the API key and revoke access.

update.title: Update API Key
update.description: Update the permission scope for this API key.

api_key.permission_scope_tooltip: The root resource for this API key, which will limit this key to access only that resource and its sub-resources.

tasks.title: Task Management
tasks.confirm_cancel_description: The task will be stopped immediately. This action cannot be undone.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.invite_placeholder: Email address or group, separated by commas

share.title: Share
share.current_file_only_tooltip: When enabled, only shares the current file. When disabled, shares with all sub-files
share.require_login_tooltip: When enabled, users must log in to view this shared resource. When disabled, anyone with the link can access it

shared_resources.password_required: Password is required to view this resource.

footer.join: Scan with WeChat to join the group

trash.title: Trash
trash.auto_delete_notice: Resources in trash older than 7 days will be automatically deleted

confirm.single_description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this resource? Once deleted, it cannot be undone.
confirm.clear_description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all resources in the trash? This action cannot be undone.
